奴兒干.definition: part of Heilongjiang and the Vladivostok area ruled by the Ming dynasty

奴兒干都司.definition: the Ming dynasty provincial headquarters in the Heilongjiang and Vladivostok area

奴家.definition: (old) your servant (humble self-reference by young female)

奴隸社會.definition: slave-owning society (precedes feudal society 封建社會|封建社会 in Marxist theory)

奴顏婢膝.definition: servile and bending the knee (idiom); fawning; bending and scraping to curry favor
